relevance_explanation: All branches and tool calls irrelevant to this customer were correctly removed including the unneeded visa check logic and the points-based booking flow. The customer data shows they have "Platinum" frequent flyer status and their payment method is "Debit Card", so steps related to other customer scenarios were properly pruned.
completeness_explanation: All required logic was preserved. The routine properly fetches the payment type, makes the correct booking, and completes the case.
